section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Weights and Measures Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Declaration of equivalents of units of measurement
section.content: The units of measurement listed in any column in the Schedule are declared to be the equivalents of any unit of measurement set out opposite thereto in any other column.

tr.td: Measurement of Mass or Weight (see note 5)
In item 1, US units of length are the same as those in the Imperial system.
In item 2, US units of area are the same as those in the Imperial system.
In item 3, US units of volume are the same as those in the Imperial system.
In item 5, except short ton and short hundredweight, US units of mass or weight are the same as those in the Imperial system.
